name: Adult Brass Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking speed, burrow 30 ft., flying speed 80 ft.
description: The Adult Brass Dragon has burnished, golden-brown scales that gleam like polished metal and large, rounded wings. Its elegant appearance is complemented by a curving tail.
memorable: Known for its love of conversation, this dragon engages in lengthy discussions with travelers and possesses powerful breath weapons.
goals: The Adult Brass Dragon enjoys basking in the sun and conversing with other beings, often exploring the world around it.
relations: This creature may associate with other metallic dragons and beings interested in lore and knowledge.
strengths: Fire immunity, powerful breath weapons, innate spellcasting, and high intelligence.
weaknesses: Relatively lower Dexterity compared to other dragons and reliance on legendary actions.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack featuring bite, claws, and tail strikes. Its attacks are powerful, including Molten Breath and Sleep Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Breath weapons capable of dealing devastating fire damage and inducing sleep.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without sight.
skills: Skilled in Arcana, History, Nature, and Persuasion, showcasing its intelligence and social abilities.
additional_information: Can use Change Shape to assume humanoid or beast forms while retaining its stats.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws three times a day.
Scholar of the Ages grants it advantage on Intelligence checks to recall lore.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast spells like Comprehend Languages and Legend Lore using Charisma.
